Notebook API Documentation¶

API Modules¶

Main application¶

Entry point of the Notebook API application.

This module creates the FastAPI application instance, configures middleware, exception handlers and includes all API routers.

async main.rate_limit_handler(request: Request, exc: RateLimitExceeded)¶

Handle too many requests for rate-limited endpoints.

Returns a JSON error with HTTP 429 status code when the client exceeds the configured rate limit.

Auth API¶

Authentication and authorization API routes.

Provides endpoints for user registration, login, email confirmation, token refresh and password reset.

async src.api.auth.confirmed_email(token: str, db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Confirm user email using a verification token.

Parameters:

token – Email verification token from the confirmation link.

Raises:

HTTPException – 400 if user is not found or token is invalid.

Returns:

Message about email confirmation status.

async src.api.auth.login_user(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(dependency=None, use_cache=True, scope=None), db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Authenticate user and return access and refresh tokens.

Raises:

HTTPException – 401 if credentials are invalid or email is not confirmed.

Returns:

JWT token pair.

async src.api.auth.new_token(request: TokenRefreshRequest, db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Issue a new access token using a valid refresh token.

Raises:

HTTPException – 401 if refresh token is invalid or expired.

Returns:

New access token and the same refresh token.

async src.api.auth.register_user(user_data: UserCreate, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Register a new user and send a confirmation email.

The user is created in the database and an email with a verification link is sent in the background.

Raises:

HTTPException – 409 if email or username is already used.

Returns:

Created user.

async src.api.auth.request_email(body: RequestEmail, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Request a new email confirmation link.

If the user exists and is not confirmed, a new confirmation email will be sent in the background.

async src.api.auth.request_password_reset(body: RequestPasswordReset, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Request a password reset email for a user.

If the user exists, a reset link with a token is sent by email. The response is always generic for security reasons.

async src.api.auth.reset_password(data: ResetPassword, token: str, db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Reset user password using a valid reset token.

Raises:

HTTPException – 400 if token is invalid or user is not found.

Returns:

Message that the password was successfully reset.

Contacts API¶

Contacts API routes.

Provides CRUD operations for contacts and an endpoint to get upcoming birthdays.

async src.api.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None), user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Create a new contact belonging to the current user.

async src.api.contacts.read_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None), user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Get a single contact by ID for the current user.

Raises:

HTTPException – 404 if contact is not found.

async src.api.contacts.read_contacts(skip: int | None = Query(0), limit: int | None = Query(100), first_name: str | None = Query(None), last_name: str | None = Query(None), email: str | None = Query(None), db: AsyncSession = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None), user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Get a list of contacts for the current user.

Supports pagination and optional filtering by first name, last name and email.

async src.api.contacts.remove_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None), user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Delete a contact for the current user.

Raises:

HTTPException – 404 if contact is not found.

async src.api.contacts.upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None), user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Get contacts whose birthdays are in the next 7 days.

async src.api.contacts.update_contact(body: ContactUpdate, contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None), user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Partially update a contact for the current user.

Raises:

HTTPException – 404 if contact is not found.

Users API¶

User-related API routes.

Provides endpoints for reading current user info and updating avatar.

async src.api.users.me(request: Request, user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Return the currently authenticated user.

This endpoint is rate-limited to avoid abuse.

async src.api.users.update_avatar_user(file: UploadFile = File(PydanticUndefined), user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_admin_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None), db: AsyncSession = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Update avatar for the current admin user.

The file is uploaded to Cloudinary and the avatar URL is stored in the database. Only users with the ‘admin’ role are allowed to call this endpoint.

Repositories¶

Repository layer for working with Contact entities.

class src.repository.contacts.ContactRepository(session: AsyncSession)¶

Bases: object

Provide CRUD operations for contacts using an async database session.

async create_contact(user: User, body: ContactCreate) → Contact¶

Create a new contact for the given user.

async get_all_contacts(user: User) → List[Contact]¶

Get all contacts belonging to the given user.

async get_contact_by_id(user: User, contact_id: int) → Contact | None¶

Get a single contact by its ID for the given user.

async get_contacts(user: User, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, first_name: str | None = None, last_name: str | None = None, email: str | None = None) → List[Contact]¶

Get a list of contacts for a given user with optional filters.

async remove_contact(user: User, contact_id: int) → Contact | None¶

Delete a contact by ID for the given user.

Returns:

Deleted contact or None if not found.

async update_contact(user: User, contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdate) → Contact | None¶

Update fields of an existing contact for the given user.

Repository layer for working with User entities.

class src.repository.users.UserRepository(session: AsyncSession)¶

Bases: object

Provide CRUD operations for users using an async database session.

async confirmed_email(email: str) → None¶

Mark user email as confirmed.

async create_user(body: UserCreate, avatar: str = None) → User¶

Create a new user with optional avatar URL.

async get_user_by_email(email: str) → User | None¶

Get a user by email.

async get_user_by_id(user_id: int) → User | None¶

Get a user by its ID.

async get_user_by_username(username: str) → User | None¶

Get a user by username.

async update_avatar_url(email: str, url: str) → User¶

Update avatar URL for a user by email.

async update_password(email: str, hashed_password: str) → User | None¶

Update user password and clear refresh token.

Services¶

Authentication and authorization service functions.

Contains helpers for password hashing, JWT token creation and retrieving current user from access token.

class src.services.auth.Hash¶

Bases: object

Utility class for hashing and verifying passwords using bcrypt.

get_password_hash(password: str)¶
pwd_context = <CryptContext>¶
verify_password(plain_password, hashed_password)¶
async src.services.auth.create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Create an access JWT token for the given payload.

src.services.auth.create_email_token(data: dict)¶

Create a JWT token used for email verification or password reset.

async src.services.auth.create_refresh_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Create a refresh JWT token for the given payload.

src.services.auth.create_token(data: dict, expires_delta: timedelta, token_type: Literal['access', 'refresh'])¶

Create a signed JWT token with expiration and token type.

async src.services.auth.get_current_admin_user(current_user: User = Depends(dependency=<function get_current_user>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Ensure that the current user has the admin role.

Raises:

HTTPException – 403 if user is not an admin.

async src.services.auth.get_current_user(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(dependency=<fastapi.security.http.HTTPBearer object>, use_cache=True, scope=None), db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Retrieve the current user from the Authorization header.

The user is first loaded from Redis cache if available, otherwise from the database. Raises HTTP 401 if the token is invalid.

async src.services.auth.get_email_from_token(token: str)¶

Decode email address from a verification or reset token.

Raises:

HTTPException – 422 if token is invalid.

async src.services.auth.verify_refresh_token(refresh_token: str, db: Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None))¶

Validate refresh token and return the associated user if valid.

Returns:

User instance or None if refresh token is invalid.

Service layer for business logic related to contacts.

class src.services.contacts.ContactService(db: AsyncSession)¶

Bases: object

High-level service for working with contacts via ContactRepository.

async create_contact(user: User, body: ContactCreate)¶

Create a new contact for a user.

async get_contact(user: User, contact_id: int)¶

Get single contact by ID.

async get_contacts(user: User, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, first_name: str | None = None, last_name: str | None = None, email: str | None = None)¶

Get contacts with filters and pagination.

async get_upcoming_birthdays(user: User, days: int = 7)¶

Return contacts with birthdays in the next N days.

async remove_contact(user: User, contact_id: int)¶

Delete contact by ID.

async update_contact(user: User, contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdate)¶

Update contact by ID.

Service layer for business logic related to users.

class src.services.users.UserService(db: AsyncSession)¶

Bases: object

High-level service for working with users via UserRepository.

async confirmed_email(email: str)¶

Mark email as confirmed.

async create_user(body: UserCreate)¶

Create user and try to generate a Gravatar avatar.

async get_user_by_email(email: str)¶

Simple getter.

async get_user_by_id(user_id: int)¶

Simple getter.

async get_user_by_username(username: str)¶

Simple getter.

async update_avatar_url(email: str, url: str)¶

Update avatar URL in DB.

Update password and clear refresh token.
